An eye because you yourself say" it's not really happening it's just porn it just making my fantasy a reality. " just look at ntr like that. Plus if you watched anime and all those harems then you know what I mean, most harem MC are just too stupid and don't deserve those chicks flocking over them like that. Ntr just points that out and makes it into a fantasy is all.

See the thing about ntr, in my opinion anyway, is that it's based around the concept of "the MC is a nice guy who sees me for me so I'll fall in love" type bit. Ntr exploits that part and says "who the fuck cares if your nice and a gentleman, if you don't take charge when it matters most then you deserve to be cucked" now mind you reality and fantasy are 2 separate things I don't condone it irl but wholeheartedly accept it as a fantasy simply because most harem MC are dumb as fuck and ntr pretty much shows what happens when your to kind or naive because the women don't want them to show concern that they take the whole thing in which turn is because the MC never once bucked up and got physical when it matters most. I'll never condone it irl besides the best way to look at this which I'm sure people have but get to caught in their feelings is ITS JUST PORN DRAWN OUT!!!!! If you go to pornhub or any other site I'm sure you'll find stuff that falls into the ntr category and won't bat....

I do also like how it is uncertain whether she is "acting" or not (though it is heavily implied one way), the conclusion is pretty much a set one. I also like the fire in the comments section so much.

What I like about ntr is the fact that women prefer physical pleasure than the affection they feel for family / boyfriend / husband etc. Physical pleasure rather than feelings. And the art is usually amazing. Obviously irl I consider cheating a horrible thing to do and to suffer, but as long as it's fiction I find it extremely exciting. Sexual fantasies are one thing, reality is another (I think no one would be happy to be betrayed in real life, even fans of ntr asd) Sorry for my terrible english

There is a far too long breakdown of why (most) NTR is hard to enjoy to even fucked up people like myself... I keep wasting my time writing these things that probably won’t get read instead of actually doing productive things. This might be unhealthy.

Why do people with great art waste their talent with NTR. Why does this have to be NTR ? I don’t get it, the story would still be hot as hell (and I don’t even like MMF threesomes and I’m saying that) without it and in fact, it actually makes it 10x harder to enjoy for no reason other than to seem more “edgy”. 

Even within the bounds of “NTR” you can still get a pass from me as long as you keep it on the fringes (literally) of the doujin, but when you put the literal cuckolding in front of the guy and make a point to show his reactions for large portions of the actual sex scenes, that’s where you lose me. It’s easy to say “lol, just imagine yourself as the guy stealing her” But A. No, it actually isn’t, and B. Even if you can do that, the constant panels showing a guys face in various forms of despair/sadness/defeat are not turn on’s, to me and to many others. Doujins like these are massive missed opportunities to what would otherwise be a really good rape/mind break Doujin.

"acting" *rolls eyes* Also look, I am not really a fan of netorare, but this stuff isn't horrible to read. If you hate it so much, its because you're putting yourself in the victim role. Instead of seeing yourself as the guy getting cucked, just enjoy as the guy who is doing the cucking, there isn't really any merit in putting yourself in the cuck's shoes if you aren't into it. Instead of getting all triggered over it, just be the guy who is getting the good bits, if you can't do that, you probably should just avoid reading it altogether.
